metadata.title: USN-2569-2 -- Apport vulnerability
metadata.description: USN-2569-1 fixed a vulnerability in Apport. Tavis Ormandy discovered that the fixed packages were still vulnerable to a privilege escalation attack. This update completely disables crash report handling for containers until a more complete solution is available.  Original advisory details:   St√©phane Graber and Tavis Ormandy independently discovered that Apport  incorrectly handled the crash reporting feature. A local attacker could use  this issue to gain elevated privileges.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-2569-2` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  python-apport - 2.14.1-0ubuntu3.10 python3-problem-report - 2.14.1-0ubuntu3.10 apport-kde - 2.14.1-0ubuntu3.10 apport-retrace - 2.14.1-0ubuntu3.10 apport-valgrind - 2.14.1-0ubuntu3.10 python3-apport - 2.14.1-0ubuntu3.10 dh-apport - 2.14.1-0ubuntu3.10 apport-gtk - 2.14.1-0ubuntu3.10 apport - 2.14.1-0ubuntu3.10 python-problem-report - 2.14.1-0ubuntu3.10 apport-noui - 2.14.1-0ubuntu3.10 No subscription required
